meanings: (힘·세력 등이) weak, feeble, light, (바람 등이) gentle

vlive.korean: [영어에 약한 미스터 리] 댄스가 저절로 나오죠? [Mr. Lee, not good at English] You can't help but dance, right? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.5 부승관의 전생연분 #1 (SeungKwan Boo's Past Life Destiny #1)
vlive.english: [Mr. Lee, not good at English] You can't help but dance, right?

vlive.korean: 궁예 말고 좀 더 약한 거 없나? Anything lighter than Gungye? 듣기 View video NCT : 시즈니기요미^^
'술 제일 약한 사람 누구예요?' "Who is the weakest towards alcohol?" 듣기 View video NCT : 안녕 싱가폴💚
아니야 - 약한 것 같아 - 약했어? No. - Not good enough. - Not good enough? 듣기 View video W PROJECT : [W PROJECT] 1분1초(돌아와줘) V LIVE
vlive.english: No. - Not good enough. - Not good enough?

vlive.korean: 맞아요 그리고 조금 있으면 이제 약 한시간 좀 남았죠? Right. And in a little bit... About an hour left? 듣기 View video VICTON : 앨리스와 승식나잇💙💛
vlive.english: Right. And in a little bit... About an hour left?
